Headline: බලු බද්ද,රැවුල් බද්ද හා බඩ බද්ද ඉදිරියේදී (සඳුදා කාටූන්)
News Content: බලු බද්ද,රැවුල් බද්ද හා බඩ බද්ද ඉදිරියේදී (සඳුදා කාටූන්)

comments.comment: The govt siphon money from people's pockets by way of taxes and given back to them a part of it in the form of free education free health service etc etc .But although they pay for these services they have to plead the mercy of authorities to get the minimal service they offer.Politicians and officials snatch a good part of this money and enjoy immense privileges.This money is also used to suppress the downtrodden masses by feeding the bloodhounds who are ready do anything on their orders.So their is a big battle in the political arena to serve the people.
